00017 
00018     google.load("search", "1");
00019 
00020     function OnLoad() {
00021       // Create a search control
00022       var searchControl = new google.search.SearchControl();
00023 
00024       // Add in a full set of searchers
00025       var localSearch = new google.search.LocalSearch();
00026       searchControl.addSearcher(localSearch);
00027       searchControl.addSearcher(new google.search.WebSearch());
00028       searchControl.addSearcher(new google.search.VideoSearch());
00029       searchControl.addSearcher(new google.search.BlogSearch());
00030 
00031       // Set the Local Search center point
00032       localSearch.setCenterPoint("New York, NY");
00033 
00034       // Tell the searcher to draw itself and tell it where to attach
00035       searchControl.draw(document.getElementById("searchcontrol"));
00036 
00037       // Execute an inital search
00038       searchControl.execute("Google");
00039     }
00040     google.setOnLoadCallback(OnLoad);
00041 
00042     //]]>
00043     </script>
00044   </head>
00045   <body>
00046     <div id="searchcontrol">Loading...</div>
00047   </body>
